description: An artificial sky island that floats on a large bubble, created for the study of weather conditions. The island is constantly drifting with the wind and serves as both a country and research institute where elderly scholars study and analyze climate around the world.

keyEvents.title: Nami Tricks the Weatheria Scholars
keyEvents.description: Nami uses manipulation to convince the scholars to let her stay and learn their weather science.
keyEvents.significance: Secures Nami's training location for the two-year timeskip.

keyEvents.title: Haredas Agrees to Train Nami
keyEvents.description: Haredas accepts to teach Nami everything about weather science and Weather Ball technology.
keyEvents.significance: Begins Nami's formal training in advanced weather manipulation.

description: An island in Paradise known as the Future Country Baldimore. It is the birthplace of Dr. Vegapunk and contains his old laboratories. The island is technologically advanced with various mechanical creations left behind by the scientist.

keyEvents.title: Franky Discovers Vegapunk's Hidden Laboratory
keyEvents.description: After an explosion, Franky discovers a second, hidden laboratory containing Vegapunk's intact blueprints.
keyEvents.significance: Provides Franky access to revolutionary scientific knowledge.

keyEvents.title: Franky Commits to Studying Vegapunk's Technology
keyEvents.description: Franky decides to remain in the hidden laboratory to study the blueprints for two years.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes Franky's training location and goals for the timeskip.

statusHistory.reason: Island remains inhabited despite the explosion

description: An island in Paradise filled with pink animals and plants. It is home to the Kamabakka Kingdom, a place where 'those with a heart of a maiden' gather. The name means 'pink' (literally 'peach-colored') in Japanese. After the destruction of Baltigo, the Revolutionary Army moved their base of operations to this island.

keyEvents.title: Attack Cuisine Revealed
keyEvents.description: Ivankov explains Attack Cuisine, the special cooking of Kamabakka Kingdom, to Sanji.
keyEvents.significance: Introduces a unique power system tied to the island's culture.

keyEvents.title: Ivankov's Challenge
keyEvents.description: Ivankov challenges Sanji to defeat the 99 masters of New Kama Kenpo.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the terms of Sanji's training on the island.

keyEvents.title: Sanji Begins Training
keyEvents.description: Sanji accepts the challenge and begins his fight against the 99 masters.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the beginning of Sanji's grueling two-year training period.

statusHistory.reason: Kingdom remains active and becomes Revolutionary Army base
